description: A possible Romano-British religious site, first excavated in 1913-14.
bibliography: Martyn, Blick, Brindle, et al, (2015), Lowbury Hill (Oxfordshire), available at: https://doi.org/10.5284/1030449
Bagnall-Smith, J., (1995), Interim report on the votive material from Romano-Celtic temple sites in Oxfordshire
